Cart.Title: Your Basket
Cart.IsEmpty: Your basket is empty, <0>browse our catalog</0>.

CheckoutSuccess.Title: We have received your order
CheckoutSuccess.Message: We have received your order and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.

Messages.AddedToCart: {{ name }} was successfully added to your basket.
Messages.RemovedFromCart: {{ name }} was successfully removed from your basket.
Messages.UpdatedCartQuantity: Updated quantity for {{ name }} to {{ quantity }}.
Messages.CouponCodeAddedToCart: Coupon code ({{ couponCode }}) was successfully applied to your basket.
Messages.CouponCodeRemovedFromCart: Coupon code was successfully removed from your basket.
Messages.SetShippingFormSuccess: Shipping form has been saved successfully.
Messages.SetShippingFormFailed: An error occurred while saving shipping form.

Errors.INVALID_QUANTITY_ERROR: The requested quantity is not available.
Errors.INSUFFICIENT_STOCK_ERROR: The requested quantity is not available.
Errors.INVALID_COUPON_CODE_ERROR: The coupon code {{ couponCode }} is not valid.
Errors.CART_ADDTO_ERROR: An error occured while adding a product to cart.
Errors.CART_AUTHORIZATION_ERROR: The current user cannot perform operations on the cart.
Errors.CART_CREATE_ERROR: An error occured while creating cart.
Errors.CART_MISSING_REQUIRED_OPTIONS_ERROR: The product's required option(s) weren't entered.
Errors.NO_VARIANT_FOUND_ERROR: Could not add the product with SKU configurable to the shopping cart: The product that was requested doesn't exist. Verify the product and try again.
Errors.ONE_COUPON_RESTRICTION_ERROR: A coupon is already applied to the cart: {{ couponCode }}.
Errors.CART_REMOVECOUPON_ERROR: An error occured while removing a coupon from the cart.
Errors.CART_UPDATE_ERROR: An error occured while updating to cart.
Errors.BILLING_ADDRESS_SAVING_ERROR: An error occured while saving the billing address.
Errors.CHECKOUT_CREATE_ERROR: An error occured while creating checkout.
Errors.EMAIL_ADDRESS_SAVING_ERROR: An error occured while saving email.
Errors.OUT_OF_STOCK_PRODUCT_IN_CART_ERROR: Some of the products are out of stock.
Errors.PAYMENT_METHOD_SAVING_FOUND_ERROR: An error occured while saving shipping method.
Errors.PLACE_ORDER_ERROR: An error occured while placing order.
Errors.SHIPPING_ADDRESS_RESTRICTION_ERROR: Some addresses can't be used due to the configurations for specific countries.
Errors.SHIPPING_ADDRESS_SAVING_ERROR: An error occured while saving the shipping address.
Errors.SHIPPING_METHOD_SAVING_FOUND_ERROR: An error occured while saving shipping method.
